thread.title: Watch Nvidia’s CES press conference live right here
thread.title_full: Watch Nvidia’s CES press conference live right here

author: Pollyanna
title: Watch Nvidia’s CES press conference live right here
text:
By Romain Dillet 
Nvidia’s press conference starts at 6:30 PM Pacific, 9:30 PM Eastern, 2:30 AM in London. Nvidia may have missed the smartphone boat, but the company accidentally became an essential chipmaker thanks to machine learning. Graphics processing units let developers run a ton of image processing tasks in parallel. That’s why carmakers are using Nvidia chips for their self-driving…   techcrunch.com – gadgets Rate this post
